template.template: Template JMX Tomcat with Macros Beta2
template.name: Template JMX Tomcat with Macros Beta2

item.name: Maximum number of active sessions so far
Number of active sessions at this moment
Number of sessions created by this manager per second
Number of sessions we rejected due to maxActive being reached
The maximum number of active Sessions allowed, or -1 for no limit

trigger.expression: {Template JMX Tomcat with Macros Beta2:jmx["Catalina:type=ThreadPool,name=\"{$AJP_CONNECTOR_DESC}-{$AJP_CONNECTOR_PORT}\"",currentThreadsBusy].last(0)} > ({Template JMX Tomcat with Macros Beta2:jmx["Catalina:type=ThreadPool,name=\"{$AJP_CONNECTOR_DESC}-{$AJP_CONNECTOR_PORT}\"",maxThreads].last(0)} *0.7)
trigger.name: 70% {$AJP_CONNECTOR_DESC} worker threads busy on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template JMX Tomcat with Macros Beta2:jmx["Catalina:type=ThreadPool,name=\"{$HTTP_CONNECTOR_DESC}-{$HTTP_CONNECTOR_PORT}\"",currentThreadsBusy].last(0)} > ({Template JMX Tomcat with Macros Beta2:jmx["Catalina:type=ThreadPool,name=\"{$HTTP_CONNECTOR_DESC}-{$HTTP_CONNECTOR_PORT}\"",maxThreads].last(0)} * 0.7)
trigger.name: 70% http-{$HTTP_CONNECTOR_PORT} worker threads busy on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template JMX Tomcat with Macros Beta2:jmx["Catalina:type=ThreadPool,name=\"{$SSL_CONNECTOR_DESC}-{$HTTP_CONNECTOR_PORT}\"",currentThreadsBusy].last(0)} > ({Template JMX Tomcat with Macros Beta2:jmx["Catalina:type=ThreadPool,name=\"{$SSL_CONNECTOR_DESC}-{$HTTP_CONNECTOR_PORT}\"",maxThreads].last(0)} * 0.7)
trigger.name: 70% {$SSL_CONNECTOR_DESC} worker threads busy on {HOST.NAME}
gzip compression is off for connector http-{$HTTP_CONNECTOR_PORT} on {HOST.NAME}
gzip compression is off for connector {$SSL_CONNECTOR_DESC} on {HOST.NAME}
